verses.text: May God give us mercy and blessing, and let \w the|strong="H5329"\w* light of his face be shining \w on|strong="H5058"\w* us; (Selah.)

\w So|strong="H6440"\w* \w that|strong="H0430"\w* men \w may|strong="H0430"\w* see \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w way|strong="H6440"\w* \w on|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* earth, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* salvation \w among|strong="H0854"\w* \w all|strong="H1288"\w* nations.
Let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples give \w you|strong="H3605"\w* praise, O God; let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* peoples give \w you|strong="H3605"\w* praise.

\w O|strong="H3034"\w* let \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* glad, \w and|strong="H0430"\w* make song \w of|strong="H0430"\w* joy; \w for|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w be|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* judge \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* righteousness, guiding \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* earth. (Selah.)

\w Let|strong="H8055"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w give|strong="H8055"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*, \w O|strong="H8055"\w* God; \w let|strong="H8055"\w* all \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w peoples|strong="H5971"\w* \w give|strong="H8055"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w praise|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* earth \w has|strong="H0430"\w* given \w her|strong="H3605"\w* increase; \w and|strong="H0430"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, even \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w give|strong="H3034"\w* \w us|strong="H5971"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* blessing.

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w will|strong="H0430"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w us|strong="H5414"\w* \w his|strong="H5414"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1288"\w*; \w so|strong="H5414"\w* \w let|strong="H5414"\w* \w all|strong="H1288"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* ends \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H5414"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w be|strong="H1288"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* fear \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*.
